SEARCH
Package controller.applicant.helper

Class ApplicantMakeEnquiry

java.lang.Object
controller.applicant.helper.ApplicantMakeEnquiry
All Implemented Interfaces:
IApplicantMakeEnquiry
Direct Known Subclasses:
OfficerMakeEnquiry
public class ApplicantMakeEnquiry extends Object implements IApplicantMakeEnquiry
Handles enquiry-related operations for an applicant, including creating, viewing, editing, and deleting enquiries tied to BTO projects.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ApplicantMakeEnquiry(Applicant applicant, ProjectList projectList, EnquiryList enquiryList)
    Constructs the enquiry handler for a specific applicant.

    Method
    Description

    Allows the applicant to submit a new enquiry for a selected project.

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicantMakeEnquiry

      public ApplicantMakeEnquiry(Applicant applicant, ProjectList projectList, EnquiryList enquiryList)
      Constructs the enquiry handler for a specific applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the logged-in applicant
      projectList - the full list of BTO projects
      enquiryList - the shared enquiry database

  • Method Details

    • makeEnquiry

      public void makeEnquiry()
      Allows the applicant to submit a new enquiry for a selected project. The enquiry will be added to the global enquiry list with PENDING status.
      Specified by:
      makeEnquiry in interface IApplicantMakeEnquiry

    • viewEnquiry

      public void viewEnquiry()
      Displays all enquiries previously made by the applicant. If none exist, a message is shown.
      Specified by:
      viewEnquiry in interface IApplicantMakeEnquiry

    • editEnquiry

      public void editEnquiry()
      Allows the applicant to edit any of their PENDING enquiries. If no editable enquiries are available, a message is shown.
      Specified by:
      editEnquiry in interface IApplicantMakeEnquiry

    • deleteEnquiry

      public void deleteEnquiry()
      Lets the applicant delete one of their own PENDING enquiries. Once deleted, the enquiry is removed from the system.
      Specified by:
      deleteEnquiry in interface IApplicantMakeEnquiry
